sentences.en: ‘She was a very pleasant, good-looking girl with long curly hair, ’ said the skipper, for whom Kate worked on a yacht sponsored by the insurance company CGU.
sentences.cn: “她长得漂亮，心地也善良，还有一头长长的卷发。” 凯特在由英国商联保险公司赞助的游艇上工作时的船长这么形容她。

sentences.en: He was not a fit companion for their skipper that particular morning.
sentences.cn: 那天早晨，他没能和队长配合好。

sentences.en: He's mighty puzzled and he's going down there later to talk to the skipper.
sentences.cn: 他也正莫名其妙呢.一会儿他要找那个艇长谈谈去.

sentences.en: I had to pass the signals to the skipper.
sentences.cn: 我得把信号传送给船长.

sentences.en: I was skipper for the first time against Copenhagen at Old Trafford last season, but to do it again against a team like Roma was a real privilege.
sentences.cn: 上赛季在老特拉福德对哥本哈根的比赛时我第一次成为队长，但在对罗马这样的比赛中再次成为队长是非常荣耀的。

sentences.en: It is in a storm that a capable skipper distinguishes himself.
Skipper: emergency landing procedure. Flaps up! Deploy!
sentences.cn: 队长: 紧急降落程序. 部署!

sentences.en: Spruance had been a junior skipper.
sentences.cn: 斯普鲁恩斯已经任级别较低的舰长了.

sentences.en: Team Australia's crew - entirely under age 25 - has a skipper all of age 20.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚船队的船员年龄都在25 岁 以下,船长年龄仅为20岁.
英格兰队的队长信心十足。

sentences.en: The England skipper is haunted by a run of low scores.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队的队长得了一连串的低分。

sentences.en: The skipper had a fine game, proving he is very much alive and kicking.
sentences.cn: 队长也踢了一场精彩的比赛, 依然显得活力十足.

sentences.en: The skipper notified the coastguard of the tragedy.
sentences.cn: 船长向海岸警卫队报告了这起灾难。

sentences.en: The Yankee skipper yesterday rejected a 1 - year offer to return in 2008.
sentences.cn: 他昨天拒绝了2008年一年的新合约.

sentences.en: With or without our near indomitable skipper, Rick Glanvill knows a crucial weekend awaits.
sentences.cn: 不管我们的英勇队长能否上场,RickGlanvil认为周末的这场比赛是至关重要的.

trans.tran_en: the person in charge of a ship
